articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: "Pakistan Se Nahi Haarna": Kapil Dev Sums Up Drama Around Indo-Pak World Cup Match | Cricket News - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India and Pakistan are scheduled to face each other on multiple occasions, in the forthcoming Asia Cup and World Cup.
articles.content: India and Pakistan don't play each other too often but the hype around the contest is as fierce as ever. With the two teams now set to face each other in the Asia Cup and the ODI World Cup this year,… [+1575 chars]
